welcome.subtitle: Your AI-powered coding assistant
welcome.description: Caret is an AI coding assistant that helps you write, debug, and improve your code. Let's get started!

rules.title: Cline Rules & Workflow Management
rules.rulesDescription: Rules allow you to provide system-level instructions to Cline. Think of them as a way to persistently include context and preferences for your projects or all conversations.
rules.workflowsDescription: Workflows allow you to define a series of steps for Cline to perform repetitive tasks like deploying services or submitting PRs. To run a workflow, type /workflow-name in the chat.

uiLanguage.title: UI Language
uiLanguage.description: The language used for Caret's user interface elements (menus, buttons, messages, etc.).
